mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dss_workspace ORDER BY dss_workspace.`create_time` DESC
SELECT id, NAME, label, description, create_by, create_time, department, product, source, last_update_time, last_update_user, workspace_type FROM dss_workspace WHERE id = #{workspaceId}

SELECT dss_onestop_user_favorites.id, dss_onestop_menu_application.id AS menuApplicationId , name, url, icon, title_cn AS title FROM dss_onestop_user_favorites join dss_onestop_menu_application on dss_onestop_user_favorites.menu_application_id = dss_onestop_menu_application.id join dss_application on dss_application.id = dss_onestop_menu_application.application_id
(dss_onestop_user_favorites.`username` = #{username} and `workspace_id` = #{workspaceId} or `dss_onestop_user_favorites`.`workspace_id` = -1) AND type = #{type}

SELECT dss_onestop_user_favorites.id, dss_onestop_menu_application.id AS menuApplicationId, name, url, icon, title_en AS `title` FROM dss_onestop_user_favorites join dss_onestop_menu_application on dss_onestop_user_favorites.menu_application_id = dss_onestop_menu_application.id join dss_application on dss_application.id = dss_onestop_menu_application.application_id
dss_onestop_user_favorites.`username` = #{username} and `workspace_id` = #{workspaceId} AND type = #{type}

SELECT CONCAT_WS('-', t1.dept_name, t2.dept_name, t3.dept_name ) FROM ( SELECT dept_name, parent_id FROM dss_admin_dept WHERE id = #{id} ) t3 LEFT JOIN dss_admin_dept t2 ON t3.parent_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN dss_admin_dept t1 ON t2.parent_id = t1.id

SELECT t1.id, t2.username, t1.join_time, t1.created_by, t3.dept_name department, t4.dept_name office, t5.role_id FROM ( SELECT * FROM dss_workspace_user WHERE workspace_id = #{id} ) t1 JOIN dss_user t2 ON t2.username = t1.username JOIN dss_admin_dept t3 ON t3.id = t2.dept_id left JOIN dss_admin_dept t4 ON t4.id = t3.parent_id join dss_workspace_user_role t5 on t5.username = t1.username and t5.workspace_id=t1.workspace_id
